meanings.definition: A type of athletic shoe with a rubber sole and canvas upper.
meanings.sent1: I wore my plimsoles to the gym for my workout.
meanings.sent2: She put on her plimsoles before heading out for a run.
meanings.sent3: The plimsoles were so bouncy, they made me feel like I was walking on clouds.
meanings.sent4: His plimsoles were like springs on his feet, propelling him forward with each step.
meanings.sent5: The bright red plimsoles stood out among the sea of sneakers at the race.

meanings.definition: A lightweight shoe with a rubber sole, typically worn for sports or casual activities.
meanings.sent1: During the picnic, she wore her plimsoles to play frisbee with friends.
meanings.sent2: The kids ran around the playground in their plimsoles, laughing and having fun.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally wore his plimsoles to the fancy dinner party, causing a few raised eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: Her plimsoles were like little clouds hugging her feet as she walked along the beach.
meanings.sent5: The plimsoles squeaked on the gym floor, announcing her arrival to the class.
